medicines.name: F.B.S (Fasting Blood Sugar)
medicines.description: Measures blood sugar after overnight fasting; helps diagnose and monitor diabetes. Fasting required: 8â€“12 hours.

medicines.name: P.P.B.S (Post Prandial Blood Sugar)
medicines.description: Measures blood sugar 2 hours after a meal; helps assess how the body handles glucose.

medicines.name: R.B.S (Random Blood Sugar)
medicines.description: Checks current blood sugar anytime; useful for quick diabetes screening or monitoring.

medicines.name: Urea
medicines.description: Measures urea level in blood; helps assess kidney function and detect kidney disease.

medicines.name: Creatinine
medicines.description: Measures creatinine in blood; helps evaluate kidney health and function.

medicines.name: C.B.C (Complete Blood Count)
medicines.description: Complete blood count; detects anemia, infections, and general blood health.

medicines.name: Lipid Profile
medicines.description: Measures cholesterol and triglycerides; helps assess risk of heart disease. Fasting required: 9â€“12 hours.

medicines.name: Thyroid Profile (T3,T4,TSH)
medicines.description: Measures thyroid hormones (T3, T4, TSH); helps diagnose thyroid disorders.

medicines.name: TSH
medicines.description: Measures TSH hormone; screens for thyroid overactivity or underactivity.

medicines.name: HbA1C
medicines.description: Checks average blood sugar over 2â€“3 months; helps monitor diabetes control.

medicines.name: Liver Function Test (LFT)
medicines.description: Evaluates liver enzymes and proteins; helps detect liver damage or disease.

medicines.name: Uric Acid
medicines.description: Measures uric acid in blood; helps diagnose or monitor gout.

medicines.name: Complete Urine Examination (CUE)
medicines.description: Tests urine for infections, kidney issues, or diabetes complications.

medicines.name: Urine For Ketone Bodies
medicines.description: Detects ketones in urine; helps monitor uncontrolled diabetes or fasting state. Best done on fresh urine sample.

medicines.name: Urine for Culture
medicines.description: Checks urine for bacterial infection; identifies the organism and guides antibiotic choice. Midstream clean catch sample needed.

medicines.name: Dengue Serology
medicines.description: Detects antibodies to dengue virus; helps confirm dengue fever infection.

medicines.name: QBC for M.P
medicines.description: Detects malaria parasites quickly; helps diagnose malaria infection.

medicines.name: Widal (Typhoid)
medicines.description: Detects antibodies against typhoid bacteria; helps diagnose typhoid fever.

medicines.name: H.I.V
medicines.description: Screening test for HIV infection; detects antibodies to HIV-1 and HIV-2.

medicines.name: HBSAG
medicines.description: Screens for hepatitis B infection; detects hepatitis B surface antigen.

medicines.name: HCV
medicines.description: Screens for hepatitis C infection; detects HCV antibodies.

medicines.name: VDRL
medicines.description: Screening test for syphilis infection.

medicines.name: G.T.T. (Glucose Tolerance Test)
medicines.description: Measures bodyâ€™s response to glucose load; helps diagnose diabetes. Fasting required; patient drinks glucose solution; multiple samples collected over 2â€“3 hours.

medicines.name: E.S.R
medicines.description: Measures rate of red blood cell settling; helps detect inflammation or infection.

medicines.name: Blood Group
medicines.description: Determines blood group (A, B, AB, O) and Rh factor.

medicines.name: TC, DC
medicines.description: Counts total and differential white blood cells; helps detect infection or allergies.

medicines.name: BT CT
medicines.description: Bleeding time and clotting time; assess how quickly blood clots.

medicines.name: Haemogram
medicines.description: Detailed blood test; includes CBC and other parameters to assess overall health.

medicines.name: S.Electrolytes (Na+, K+, Cl)
medicines.description: Measures sodium, potassium, and chloride levels; helps detect electrolyte imbalances.

medicines.name: SGOT
medicines.description: Measures SGOT enzyme; helps detect liver or heart damage.

medicines.name: SGPT
medicines.description: Measures SGPT enzyme; helps assess liver health.

medicines.name: Alkaline Phosphatase (ALP)
medicines.description: Measures ALP enzyme; helps detect liver, bile duct, or bone disorders.

medicines.name: Vitamin D (25 Hydroxy)
medicines.description: Measures vitamin D (25 hydroxy); helps diagnose deficiency affecting bones and immunity.

medicines.name: Vitamin B12
medicines.description: Measures vitamin B12; helps detect deficiency linked to anemia or nerve problems.

medicines.name: Vitamin B6
medicines.description: Measures vitamin B6; helps detect deficiency affecting nerves and metabolism.

medicines.name: FSH
medicines.description: Measures FSH hormone; helps assess fertility and ovarian/testicular function.

medicines.name: LH
medicines.description: Measures LH hormone; helps assess fertility and hormonal balance.

medicines.name: Prolactin
medicines.description: Measures prolactin hormone; helps detect causes of infertility or abnormal lactation.

medicines.name: H.C.G (Urine Pregnancy Test)
medicines.description: Detects pregnancy hormone in urine; confirms pregnancy.

medicines.name: BETA HCG
medicines.description: Measures betaâ€‘hCG hormone in blood; used to confirm and monitor pregnancy.

medicines.name: Insulin (Fasting)
medicines.description: Measures fasting insulin; helps assess insulin resistance. Fasting required: 8â€“12 hours.

medicines.name: Prothrombin Time (PT/INR)
medicines.description: Measures clotting time (PT/INR); helps monitor blood thinning therapy.

medicines.name: APTT
medicines.description: Measures blood clotting time (APTT); helps detect bleeding disorders.

medicines.name: Stool (Occult Blood)
medicines.description: Detects hidden blood in stool; screens for colon disorders or bleeding.

medicines.name: FT3
medicines.description: Measures free triiodothyronine hormone; helps assess thyroid function.

medicines.name: FT4
medicines.description: Measures free thyroxine hormone; helps assess thyroid function.

medicines.name: CA 125
medicines.description: Tumor marker; helps detect ovarian cancer and monitor treatment.

medicines.name: CA 15.3
medicines.description: Tumor marker; helps detect breast cancer and monitor treatment.

medicines.name: CA 19.9
medicines.description: Tumor marker; helps detect pancreatic, stomach, or colon cancer.

medicines.name: CEA
medicines.description: Tumor marker; helps detect colon cancer and monitor treatment.

medicines.name: PSA (Prostate Specific Antigen)
medicines.description: Prostate cancer screening; measures total PSA level in men.

medicines.name: PSA Free
medicines.description: Prostate cancer test; measures free PSA to help differentiate cancer from benign enlargement.

medicines.name: Testosterone Total
medicines.description: Measures total testosterone; helps assess male fertility and hormonal balance.

medicines.name: Micro Albumin Ratio
medicines.description: Detects small amounts of albumin in urine; early kidney damage test.

medicines.name: Micro Albumin / Creatinine Ratio
medicines.description: Calculates ratio of microalbumin to creatinine; helps detect early kidney disease.

medicines.name: Triple Marker
medicines.description: Prenatal screening test; checks risk of chromosomal abnormalities in pregnancy.

medicines.name: Dual Marker
medicines.description: Prenatal screening test; measures two markers to assess risk of Down syndrome.

medicines.name: Quadruple Marker
medicines.description: Prenatal screening test; measures four markers for risk of genetic conditions.

medicines.name: Homocysteine
medicines.description: Measures homocysteine; high levels may increase heart disease risk.

medicines.name: Sputum for AFB
medicines.description: Detects tuberculosis bacteria in sputum sample.

medicines.name: Pus Culture
medicines.description: Tests pus sample for bacterial infection; helps guide antibiotic choice.

medicines.name: Stool For Culture
medicines.description: Tests stool for bacterial infection.

medicines.name: Blood for Culture
medicines.description: Tests blood sample for bacterial infection; guides treatment.

medicines.name: 24 Hours Urine for Protein
medicines.description: Collects all urine over 24 hours; measures total protein loss.

medicines.name: 24 Hrs Urine for Sodium
medicines.description: Collects 24â€‘hour urine to measure sodium excretion.

medicines.name: Spot Urine Albumin
medicines.description: Spot urine test for albumin; screens for kidney disease.

medicines.name: Spot Urine Protein
medicines.description: Spot urine test for total protein; helps assess kidney health.

medicines.name: Spot Urine Creatinine
medicines.description: Spot urine test for creatinine; part of kidney function tests.

medicines.name: Spot Urine Sodium
medicines.description: Spot urine test for sodium level; helps assess electrolyte balance.

medicines.name: AMH
medicines.description: Measures antiâ€‘MÃ¼llerian hormone; assesses ovarian reserve.

medicines.name: ANA (Anti Nuclear Antibodies)
medicines.description: Detects antinuclear antibodies; helps diagnose autoimmune disorders like lupus.

medicines.name: HLAB27
medicines.description: Genetic test linked to arthritis risk (ankylosing spondylitis).

medicines.name: Chicken Gunya (IgG, IgM)
medicines.description: Detects past or current chikungunya infection (IgM, IgG).

medicines.name: ANA (IFA Method)
medicines.description: Detailed ANA test by immunofluorescence; helps diagnose autoimmune disease.

medicines.name: Anti CCP Anti Bodies
medicines.description: Detects antiâ€‘CCP antibodies; helps diagnose rheumatoid arthritis.

medicines.name: Anti TPO Anti Bodies
medicines.description: Detects antiâ€‘TPO antibodies; helps diagnose thyroid autoimmune disease.

medicines.name: Coombs (Direct)
medicines.description: Detects antibodies bound directly to red cells; helps diagnose hemolytic anemia.

medicines.name: Coombs (Indirect)
medicines.description: Detects free antibodies in plasma; used in blood transfusion work.

medicines.name: CPK
medicines.description: Measures creatine phosphokinase enzyme; helps detect muscle injury or heart disease.

medicines.name: Estradiol (E2)
medicines.description: Measures estradiol hormone; helps assess ovarian function and fertility.

medicines.name: Serum Iron
medicines.description: Measures iron level in blood; helps detect deficiency or overload.

medicines.name: Serum Magnesium
medicines.description: Measures blood magnesium level; helps detect electrolyte imbalance.

medicines.name: Serum Phosphorus
medicines.description: Measures blood phosphorus; important for bone and kidney health.

medicines.name: Serum Copper
medicines.description: Measures copper in blood; helps diagnose Wilsonâ€™s disease or deficiency.

medicines.name: Serum Ferritin
medicines.description: Measures stored iron (ferritin); low in iron deficiency, high in inflammation.

medicines.name: Serum Lipase
medicines.description: Measures lipase enzyme; helps diagnose pancreatitis.

medicines.name: Serum Amylase
medicines.description: Measures amylase enzyme; helps diagnose pancreatitis.

medicines.name: Progesterone
medicines.description: Measures progesterone; helps assess ovulation and pregnancy.

medicines.name: Total Iron Binding Capacity (TIBC)
medicines.description: Measures ironâ€‘binding capacity; helps evaluate iron deficiency or overload.

medicines.name: Troponin-I
medicines.description: Heart attack marker; detects troponinâ€‘I in blood.

medicines.name: Troponin-T
medicines.description: Heart attack marker; detects troponinâ€‘T in blood.

medicines.name: Parathyroid Hormone (PTH)
medicines.description: Measures parathyroid hormone; helps detect calcium metabolism disorders.

medicines.name: Torch Profile
medicines.description: Screening test for infections in pregnancy (toxoplasmosis, rubella, CMV, herpes).

medicines.name: P ANCA
medicines.description: Autoimmune test; helps diagnose vasculitis.

medicines.name: C ANCA
medicines.description: Autoimmune test; helps diagnose vasculitis.

medicines.name: Complement - 3
medicines.description: Complement protein C3; helps assess immune function.

medicines.name: Complement - 4
medicines.description: Complement protein C4; helps assess immune disorders.

medicines.name: D - Dimer
medicines.description: Measures clot breakdown product; helps detect blood clots (DVT, PE).

medicines.name: CD3, CD4 & CD8 Profile
medicines.description: Measures Tâ€‘cell subsets (CD3, CD4, CD8); helps monitor immune status (e.g., HIV).

medicines.name: Anti DS-DNA
medicines.description: Detects antiâ€‘dsDNA antibodies; helps diagnose lupus.

medicines.name: Serum Total IGE
medicines.description: Measures total IgE; high in allergies and asthma.

medicines.name: QuantiFerron Gold TB
medicines.description: Blood test to detect latent tuberculosis infection.

medicines.name: FNAC
medicines.description: Cytology test; examines cells from lumps or swellings.

medicines.name: Mantoux
medicines.description: Tuberculin skin test; screens for TB infection.

medicines.name: NT-PRO BNP
medicines.description: Measures heart failure marker; high in heart failure.

medicines.name: CRP
medicines.description: Measures Câ€‘reactive protein; helps detect inflammation or infection.

medicines.name: Serum Calcium
medicines.description: Measures total calcium; important for bone and heart health.
